label: 寄人
本: Land, Power, and the Sacred The Estate System in Medieval Japan . University of Hawai'i Press . 2018
著者: Goodwin, Janet R. (ed.)/ Piggott, Joan R. (ed.)
見出し読み: よりうど, よりゅうど
見出し読み_mod: よりうど, よりゅうど
説明文: dependent or low-ranking functionary who performed miscellaneous duties, including supplying goods, for royal or courtier households, or large religious institutions. Yoriudo sometimes lived on estates whose proprietors were not their own patrons. See jinin, kugonin.
